{"id":390398964,"lang":"cpp","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1599124050,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/390398964/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"70.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode *preHead = new ListNode(0);\n        ListNode *curNode = preHead;\n        auto carry = 0;\n        while (l1 != nullptr || l2 != nullptr || carry > 0){\n            auto nodeVal = ( (l1 == nullptr) ? 0 : l1->val ) +\n                           ((l2 ==nullptr)? 0:l2->val) + carry;\n            carry = nodeVal/10;\n            nodeVal = nodeVal % 10;\n\n            curNode->next = new ListNode(nodeVal);\n            curNode = curNode->next;\n            l1 = (l1 == nullptr) ? nullptr : l1->next;\n            l2 = (l2 == nullptr) ? nullptr : l2->next;\n        }\n        return preHead->next;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
